channel.title: 317 Uberlution
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/BDF0NJq.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4PDDQNV.png[/img]
[b]LINKS:[/b]
[b]Website/Forums:[/b] [url=http://uberlution.co.uk/]http://uberlution.co.uk/[/url]
[b]Client Download:[/b] [url=http://uberlution.co.uk/Client.zip]http://uberlution.co.uk/Client.zip[/url]
[b]About[/b]
Welcome to the thread advertising this brand new server Uberlution! Uberlution was started to bring entertainment for those people who love PKing! The goal is to bring the best enjoyment we can and to do this we allow the players to choose the content we add to the game, you suggest it and we will implant it!
[b]Features[/b]
VPS hosted; Player killing achievments w/ shop; EP drop system; Target system; Pets w/ Member Only Pets; PKing highscores in-game; Quick prayers & curses; Great switching and combat formula; Stauettes as drops as way to gain coins w/ Coin Shop; 'Item Points' gained from a player kill or boss kill; 'Item Points' shop to purchase some of the best items;
[b]Pictures[/b]
Starter(You also recieve a bank full of goods!); [img]http://i.imgur.com/NZ47Vqk.png[/img]
Awesome Statistic Tracker; [img]http://i.imgur.com/nxNn6Fg.png[/img]
Player Killing achievments; [img]http://i.imgur.com/EDornlt.png[/img]
Plenty of shops to buy what you need; [img]http://i.imgur.com/sxBHzya.png[/img]
Choose your own levels!; [img]http://i.imgur.com/Eec2CtO.png[/img]
Amazing clan chat so you can create a PKing clan; [img]http://i.imgur.com/T2P0GRN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SHF7J54.png[/img]
Settings; [img]http://i.imgur.com/s2FxmEL.png[/img]
Item points shop(These disappear upon death) [img]http://i.imgur.com/tZQWK1B.png[/img]
Coins shop(Items go to bank on death) [img]http://i.imgur.com/MdvmLTA.png[/img]
Coins shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/xaQDdf9.png[/img]
Other Shops [img]http://i.imgur.com/YI28IT9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wqRgZMO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PEaeXgJ.png[/img]
AND PLENTY MORE SHOPS TO VIEW IN-GAME! [img]http://i.imgur.com/VDuB26K.png[/img]
Updates, 05/04/14:
Here is what has just been added/fixed/tweaked on Uber!
- Special attack will now restore at a perfect rate instead of not at all. - New items in the point shop(Items past TokHaar-Kal will drop on floor on death) - New items in coin shop. - Updated coin shop prices. - DDS has been buffed due to it being way too underpowered.
NEW ITEM POINT ITEMS - Slayer Helmet - 30 Item Points Dragon Claws - 200 Item Points Armadyl GS - 250 Item Points Bandos GS - 75 Item Points Saradomin GS - 125 Item Points Zamorak GS - 125 Item Points Coloured Whips - 20 Item Points Staff of Light - 20 Item Points
NEW COIN SHOP ITEMS - Completionist Cape Full Dharoks Full Ahrims Full Karils
PRICE UPDATES - Whip is now 700k Dark Bow is now 900k[/center]

item.title: 317 Uberlution
item.dc:creator: @Mag3Rang3Pk3 Mag3Rang3Pk3
item.description:
@Mag3Rang3Pk3 wrote:

[center]

LINKS:

Website/Forums:
http://uberlution.co.uk/

Client Download:
http://uberlution.co.uk/Client.zip

About

Welcome to the thread advertising this brand new server Uberlution! Uberlution was started to bring entertainment for those people who love PKing! The goal is to bring the best enjoyment we can and to do this we allow the players to choose the content we add to the game, you suggest it and we will implant it!

Features

VPS hosted;
Player killing achievments w/ shop;
EP drop system;
Target system;
Pets w/ Member Only Pets;
PKing highscores in-game;
Quick prayers & curses;
Great switching and combat formula;
Stauettes as drops as way to gain coins w/ Coin Shop;
‘Item Points’ gained from a player kill or boss kill;
‘Item Points’ shop to purchase some of the best items;

Pictures

Starter(You also recieve a bank full of goods!);

Awesome Statistic Tracker;

Player Killing achievments;

Plenty of shops to buy what you need;

Choose your own levels!;

Amazing clan chat so you can create a PKing clan;

Settings;

Item points shop(These disappear upon death)

Coins shop(Items go to bank on death)

Coins shop

Other Shops


AND PLENTY MORE SHOPS TO VIEW IN-GAME!

Updates, 05/04/14:

Here is what has just been added/fixed/tweaked on Uber!

  • Special attack will now restore at a perfect rate instead of not at all.
  • New items in the point shop(Items past TokHaar-Kal will drop on floor on death)
  • New items in coin shop.
  • Updated coin shop prices.
  • DDS has been buffed due to it being way too underpowered.

NEW ITEM POINT ITEMS -
Slayer Helmet - 30 Item Points
Dragon Claws - 200 Item Points
Armadyl GS - 250 Item Points
Bandos GS - 75 Item Points

Whip is now 700k
Dark Bow is now 900k[/center]
